channel.title: catalin jora's blog
channel.description: Recent content on catalin jora's blog

item.title: info
item.description: Hi there, I’m Catalin, a software engineer located in the Netherlands. Currently I’m consulting on cloud native technologies and bootstrapping a product around cloud computing cost: Oktamize. I’m also the organizer of the Dutch Docker meetup and one of the organizers of Serverless Days Amsterdam conference I’ll blog about my journey into bootstrapping a company (second attempt), tech events, tech how-to’s (Docker, Kubernetes, etc) and books worth reading. You can reach out by twitter (DM’s are open) or email: catalin [@] oktamize.
